reviews.review_text: I headed straight to The Lobster Man for lunch upon reaching Granville island market. My wife and I ordered Signature and Connecticut lobster roll. I preferred the former while my wife preferred the latter. Both were so good. It s not a restaurant but more of a takeout place with some outdoor seating. I love it as it serves great lobster rolls without much fanfare and sitting outdoors in a casual environment is such an enjoyment. We visited the live seafood next door where we were keen to try the sea urchins. However, they don t cut the sea urchins for you so I decided it was too much hassle to cut it myself. It didn t look as delicious as ones I had in Hokkaido so am ok to give it a pass. Don t miss out on the lobster rolls though.

Live lobster, crab, and oysters are often considered some of the best options for seafood enthusiasts for several reasons: 1. Freshness: Live seafood is the epitome of freshness. When you order live lobster, crab, or oysters, you can be confident that youre getting seafood at its peak quality and flavor. 2. Flavor: Live seafood tends to have a more delicate and succulent flavor compared to seafood that has been frozen or stored for an extended period. The natural sweetness of these creatures is best preserved when they are alive until just before cooking. 3. Texture: The texture of live lobster and crab is exceptional. When cooked properly, the meat is tender, juicy, and full of natural juices, making it a delightful dining experience. Oysters, on the other hand, are prized for their unique texture and briny, oceanic taste. 4. Interactive Dining: Theres an interactive aspect to dining on live seafood. Preparing and cracking open a lobster or crab can be a fun and engaging experience, perfect for social gatherings and special occasions. It s really fun dining experience here in lobster man. Especially thank staff Sean. He provided exceptional service. He was attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable. Sean went above and beyond to ensure our dining experience was enjoyable. We appreciated his recommendations and the way he made us feel well taken care of throughout the meal. Thank you, Sean, for making our visit special!

I do have a shellfish allergy so I bet you are wondering why am I even reviewing this place? Well, if you walk past the sit-down restaurant, you come across fresh seafood; oysters, crabs, lobsters and mussels. Heck theyll even cook the lobster and crab for you! As you know, I love oysters and they are reasonably priced almost, a hidden gem. If you live in the area want, fresh seafood or  hosting a party this is the spot for you!

Can t speak much for their actual menu, but I ve ordered live lobsters from this place a couple times now and they have always been great. Their online ordering system works very smoothly, the lobsters are fresh and are always packed so securely that we were able to come via motorcycle to pickup our order (which we carried home in a backpack with no mess!) and the lobsters were still alive by the time we arrived home to steam them.

The lobster rolls here were too too good. The meat was so fresh that you could feel the softness in it. They could do better with their fries though, super oily and I somehow did not enjoy them. But a 5* for their rolls.

Cheap place to enjoy lobster! The seating is limited, but dont worry, as customers eat quickly and move on. If youre in the mood for oysters, theres a neighboring vendor; however, they dont offer dine-in options.

Great place to buy fresh seafood.  Went next door for the lobster roll.   Price has gone up since earlier this year.   Now it s $23 plus taxes, which is expensive it still very good.  Small outdoor patio. Great to bike to as you can have your bike close by.
If you love lobster, don t walk - run to Granville Island. We crave these lobster rolls on regular basis. They are SO FRESH and delicious. Make sure to get there before last call at 5:30pm!

The seafood here is so cheap! I brought back a bunch of clams and oysters for my family. I just called them the same day and they had everything ready for the airplane. My flight was delayed by many hours. But the seafood was still fresh and alive when I arrived back home. Everything was packed securely and appropriately. I had no issues bringing it. The seafood prices were really competitive.

We got the classic lobster roll and Manhattan clam chowder. They were both amazing! There s not a lot of seating but the meal isn t a large portion so by the time you ordered and got your food, a spot cleared up!

Nice lobster place at Granville Island! I got this simple, yet tasty lobster sandwich and went to eat it at the square near the Granville market. That little sit down with the lobster, the music and the sunshine made my entire day.

Lobster man, what a man. You can taste special creamy, fresh sandwiches with cruncky fries. Waiting line is long (maybe 20 minutes) but this is so worth it. Highly recommend when you go to Granville Island.
If you re craving a good lobster roll that this is the place to come in please order the Connecticut roll because it s truly the best!!

Lobster rolls were divine - both the signature (miso mayo) & connecticut (melted butter) were great. Dungeness crab roll had a bit too much sauce that the sweetness of the flesh couldnt stand out on its own. Manhattan clam chowder was yummy but very tiny portion. Get the live lobster/crab cooked on the spot if you can - absolutely worth it. Theyll even crack everything for you if you ask nicely. Pity oysters cant be shucked by them.

What a great meal! Prices are reasonable considering how much meat they put into the rolls. We got both the lobster and crab rolls. It s nicely toasted and dressed, compliments the sweetness of the meat. Love the outdoor seating but not a fan of it being so close to other businesses where they smoke cigarettes nearby. Parking available near the ferry docks and walking over.
If you visit Granville Island you have to try this lobster roll - it is famous for a reason! Great service and delightful food.

Im super happy that lobster man is finally selling  grab and go food!      We havent been to Granville Island for at least a year and we were so surprise to see the retail store was opened. Needless to say, the SUBs were goooooooood!!! Very delicious, and its super FRESH!  Juicy, tender, well seasoned, you name it! Clam chowder is good too, and we will definitely come back to try everything on your menu. Lol. Thats how good they are!

By far one of the best lobster roll in Vancouver! A must go if you re visiting Granville Island. The lobsters are sourced from the east coast as the meat is very tender and sweet! The Dungeness crab is quite good and savour

Got the Dungeness Crab Bun ($23). Very fresh and lots of real crab meat for the size of the bun. Super delicious, and the dill/celery combination compliments very well. Only con is it s a bit on the small side for the price.
These lobster rolls are Maritimer-approved. The brioche buns are VERY fresh and very good.
Had the Connecticut roll. It was delicious! Good amount of lobster and the flavor was very nice. The brioche bun was so yummy. Recommend this spot!
Each bite is a delectable blend of richness and freshness, making this sandwich a gourmet delight!

My go to place for lunch when visiting Granville Island. I love my seafood and this hits the spot when I want a lobster roll. Great place to visit with friendly staff. The price is reasonable and one order is quite filling. Highly recommended!

Visited Granville and had to try the lobster roll. Got the Connecticut lobster roll. Which was $25, which was a bit pricey. But the brioche bun, and butter lobster was worth it. It came with ruffle potato fries. Not much for seating so get it to go and find one of the many near locations to sit and enjoy. Also make sure to grab plenty of napkins, you will need them.

Enjoyed a dairy free lobster brioche roll. Mayo, lettuce, celery and good chunks of lobster! Outdoor seating next to the shellfish shop makes the experience even better. Crab and shrimp rolls also available.

Lobster Man is a must when in Granville island! We got some oysters and a steamed lobster. We brought our own corn and baby potatoes to eat with it. The staff are super kind and willing to help. Lobster gets steamed quickly and free of charge. Lemon and butter is available for pretty cheap as well.

First time at The Lobster Man and tried there specialty lobster roll and Connecticut lobster roll! AND BOTH were delicious! Would definitely come back for more and recommend anyone going to Granville Island to try it ! Chips were paired greatly with the rolls!
Good price and fresh oyster and lobster ! They dont open for oyster but you can buy oyster knife and easy to open it up. They do cook for lobster and cutting. Thx for perfect dinner :)

Stumbled upon this place while exploring Granville island and I got to say their lobster roll really hit the spot. Great use of fresh and delicious ingredients all mounted on a brioche bun served with a side of crisps which helps with finishing off the pieces of lobster that fall off while eating. 100% recommend

I got the signature lobster roll. I saw the staff pack 2 giant scoops to the rim in the bun...I was smiling ear to ear :D Nice, fresh, creamy with a few crunchy bite of celery in it yum yum yum yum yummy
Fresh lobster rolls which are excellently seasoned.  For the oyster lovers you can also purchase a variety of oysters which you can eat there for a fraction of the restaurant price.

The key part of this fabulous dinner meal was arriving at Granville Island, parking just in front of the entrance to The Lobster Man where live shellfish are readily available..this store has been a part of Granville Island community of businesses since 1977 and we have been longtime advocates of their focus on quality and sustainable..the staff are exceptionally helpful and very open to answer any questions..So purchasing our oysters was the first step, now we arrive home for a fabulous meal with warm French bread and fresh asparagus...the entire day was a great success...

Ignore the Haters, this place is great! Had the Manhattan clam chowder and the Signature Lobster Roll... Both were delicious! Ive made lobster rolls before and its a lotta work. The rolls are generous in portion and other than the miso Mayo (which I didnt really taste) they got the classic just right. Looking forward to trying the Dungy crab roll next time. The reviewer complaining about chives on the roll and foreign ownership... stay home, please. Soup was good too, just wished their cup was a little bigger. Small streetside patio which is great to enjoy when the weather is cooperative.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tri, Thanks so much for your positive review! We appreciate your kind comments and were glad to see that you enjoyed the soup and our lobster roll. We look forward to seeing you again next time :)

reviews.review_text: I come here to buy their fresh oyster only. The quality has always been great and prices are reasonable. Royal miyagis are currently at $1.35 per piece if you buy a dozen and the oysters are sizeable. Parking is a pain at Granville Island but unless you are here for some walk, you can probably just park near the store and quickly buy some to go without paying.
wow, the cheap price with the most fresh lobster. They can cook for you if need. A wonderful place at Granville Island

Great place for lobster, crab, shrimp, oysters, clams and mussels. Tough to go wrong with $9.95 for a dozen oysters. The annual lobster boil is worth showing up for as well. If you are ever in a pinch you can pick up a freshly boiled container of lobster for a quick salad.
Great place to get oysters and other fresh seafood. My husband and I have been coming here for years to buy raw oysters and they are always fresh and delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great review! We appreciate your loyalty over the years and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: My whole trip was pretty much me saying, if only I lived in Vancouver. I would be at Lobster Man weekly. Go here, experience the Oysters and by golly take some home for me! I wish I could have! It was one of the coolest little crustacean markets Ive ever been to. Pro-tip: THEY DO NOT shuck oysters for you, so bring your own knife or purchase one at the store (I think it was $9).
Super expensive signature lobster roll... Worth every penny! Grab one of these and go sit by the water to enjoy it.
We ordered Signature lobster roll and Octopus salad, both of them are delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jean, thank you for sharing your positive feedback! Were so glad you gave us a try and hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great quality lobster, generous serving, warm fresh brioche and balanced flavour!
Meal with the chips was very very tasty and didn t have to wait long at all! The server was really kind as well. This restaurant deserves the hype coming from tourist tiktok
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lean, we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our food and had a great experience. We appreciate you sharing your feedback and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: The market next door is amazing for your fresh shellfish needs
This is a great place to buy some lobster, mussels and oysters Super nice and helpful stuff
If you want a variety of fresh clams, oysters, other seafoods, look no further. You wont regret. Highly recommend.
They cooked and cracked the crab for us as well. The amount of crab meat is incredible! I will definitely visit again!

Lobster rolls are ubiquitous on the east coast with varying price ranges depending mostly on location & presentation, sometimes upwards of thirty US dollars. The Lobster Man offers two distinct rolls, the Signature & the Connecticut, that offer significant value for flavour & presentation. Sure, theres some shredded lobster in the mayo, but its topped with generous chunks that almost require the use of the included fork. I ate mine without the fork & it was challenging & satisfying. The brioche bun is mildly sweet, soft, & fluffy. The included lemon & chips in the box make for easy take away. A moist towelette is included because this is hands-on comfort food! (update: prices have increased +30% in 2022)
I got the lobster roll for the first time, and it really blew me away. So delicious and its absolutely to die for!

I took a group of friends here for lunch as I hadn t seen them for quite some time. There were 10 of us and we all agreed that these were the best lobster rolls we had ever experienced. We also had the shrimp cocktail, that was incredible. Fresh beyond belief!  The service was so friendly and they couldn t do enough for you. I will definitely be back and so will the other 9. This place gets 10 out of 10 in all categories.

Id like to say a big thank you for being so friendly and welcoming. Theres plenty of places in Vancouver that are not but at Lobster Man, the ladies here we very kind and welcoming the moment I walked through the door and were happy to take my order. Thank you for that, its very refreshing. Dont ever lose that. As for the food, its amazing and so delicious. The Connecticut roll had me enjoying every last bite. I wish I could eat a whole bowl of that delicious lobster
The Connecticut lobster roll was so delicious! Seasoned and buttery, the perfect combo with chips!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Reema, thanks so much for the great review! We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Amazing service the food presentation was great and the taste OMG was to die for,  definitely we are going back thank you guys for the great job
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Liliana! We really appreciate your feedback and am so happy you enjoyed it. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Wonderful Connecticut lobster roll and crab roll. Both had a fair and reasonable amount of meat in them, and I appreciated the fresh brioche - the sweetness pairs well with the seafood. I prefer a bit less bread, so I just sliced off part of the roll lengthwise, leaving me with my ideal ratio of bread to meat. I also topped off both rolls with a bit more melted butter, but again, personal preference.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jeff, Thank you for the positive review! We are glad you enjoyed your overall experience and have taken your feedback about the bread to meat ratio to heart. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great selection of oysters. Lighthouse oysters were little bit hard to shuck, but my friends loved them.

Fresh, good prices and a wonderful selection. Staff are extremely helpful and polite. Parking and location easy. These folks are consistently pumping out some incredible products. Today in particular was an extremely delicious day where they had savory clams and some new oysters. Hats off Lobster Man for putting restaurants to shame and letting people enjoy high quality oysters at a great and reasonable price.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tigran for the 5-star review and kind words. We really appreciate your support and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: You will find great fresh seafood here! Large variety of oysters!
Their lobster is always very fresh and delicious. I recommend this place..
freshest lobster sub! fresh from the ocean :)

Great spot to buy a great variety of oysters, clams and mussels. Lobster and crab galore which they will cook for you for take home. Next door they have tasty takeouts. We have never been disappointed by the quality of their seafood.
Excellent service ! We made the crab cook and we went to eat it at the Stanley park !
Fresh seafood, a lot different osyter to choose.  Friendly staff with good knowledge of their products. And sandwich is killer.

Easy online ordering process for pickup.  Pick your preferred crab weight.  Pick date and time of pickup.  Done! Plenty of free parking on Granville island.  Even on busy weekends.  Who knows how long the free parking will last? The prices are pretty good.  I m happy with the price.  Definitely cheaper than ordering a whole crab in a restaurant. It was handed to me in a plastic bag with a bag of ice but I live nearby so it wasn t a problem.  If you have to travel far, maybe ask about other packaging methods.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael, thank you for the detailed feedback! We re glad to hear that you enjoyed your overall experience. We also do have travel packaging options if you are ever travelling far. We hope to see you again soon and thanks for sharing some great pictures on social media!

reviews.review_text: Fresh seafood at very reasonable prices in the heart of Granville island.

Incredible experience at the Lobster Man today! New retail manager Shelly (I think that was her name) was so lovely, patiently helping me examine the sea urchin and finally handpicking some paradise oysters for me. Seeing as the seafood vendors inside the public market itself are marking everything up, this is the place to go to instead for all your shellfish needs! Super fresh and well priced, and top service. Ill be back as soon as I can!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and positive review Iris! We re glad Shelley could help you and look forward to seeing you next time.

reviews.review_text: They boil lobsters and crabs for you if you want. Absolutely delicious and a great view eating outside!

We went into the new part of Lobsterman where they have lobster rolls, ready to eat shrimp cocktail and large assortment of frozen seafood. The lobster rolls are served in a brioche bun with some crispy potato chips on the side. Full of lobster meat, delicately seasoned so that you could taste the freshness of the lobster - it should be on everyone s list of things to eat while on Granville Island. There is a small outdoor area where you can sit to smell the ocean breezes while enjoying lobster rolls. The frozen seafood had a wide assortment of seafood and individual portions of frozen mahi mahi, salmon, black cod .  One would expect higher prices with the outstanding quality of the seafood here , but they are lower or at par as any grocery store. Will definitely be back!

The food is good and one of the employees there were sooooo friendly and nice! She had brownish reddish hair? My only regret is not giving her more tips anyways this place is goooood + [Edited] I went again to see her cause my friend was interested in her but apparently she quit    so sad  he wanted to get her number next time we come but he never did

Purchased a cooked and cracked Atlantic lobster through their online website. It was ready for pickup at the requested time (literally just boxed) and I was able to prepay for it online. The quality was amazing and the cracking was impeccable (I didnt need any tools to dig right into it!). I would definitely order from here again. Painless and hassle-free!
Small little shop, simple uncomplicated food with high quality ingredients

This place is HEAVEN for seafood lovers! They have spot prawns, lobster, crabs, scallop, oysters, etc. Fresh and reasonably priced, best of all, steaming service for free! Planning on an memorable picnic or potluck near Granville Island or the seawall? Come pick a lobster or crab and have them help you cook before you go! Highly recommend!
The crab roll was delicious and the staff pleasant and customer focussed.
Truly fresh swimming Lived Canadian Lobsters indeed
Fresh and delicious. I always buy a lobster and let the store crack and cook for me to take home.

I can trust the quality because I can choose by myself. If you want to get steamed lobster, you need to go before 4:30. ( Strongly recommended! Its very convenient, and even its free ) That service will be provided for crab and lobster but shellfish are not.
One of the best lobster rolls I have ever had!

Had a great lunch of 24 oysters today. Sure I had to buy an oyster knife and learn how to shuck them myself but I had a great time and made some memories. Yes i had to pay for the knife I needed but I still got a great deal, 24 oysters and a souvenir for about C$30 is a bargain
Had awesome scallops (frozen) and fresh oysters from here!
Really Enjoyed the Lobster Roll
Good selections of West coast and east coast oysters for descent price. Cheaper if buy in dozens. Also have live crabs and lobsters which they can cook on site for free.  Friendly staffs.
Fresh boiled lobster with good price and kind staff
Tried their live oyster, bought a dozen back for $18 and shuck it myself, super fresh and cheap. Not to be missed if you are there

Went there on Canada Day for Lobster. Had to wait in line but totally worthy it. Oh my, the best. Fresh with great price. Just need to prepare to get dirty with your hands. I took the shell home to make soup.
We loved it!
The Lobster Man is always a 1st priority goto when we visit Vancouver. Always order the Connecticut Lobster roll....PERFECTION !
I always bought fresh oyster and scaloops here everytime I visit Granville island .And also the signature lobster roll its awesome
Fresh seafood, be patient with the staff, theyll give you great service if you just be more clear on what you want.
We picked up the most delicious oysters yesterday for $1.25 each. If you want oysters at home this is the place to pick them up!
Valuable abd fresh oyster
Best lobster I ve tried so far, ingredients are fresh and well served. Totally recommended
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you German for the 5-star review! We really appreciate the recommendation and positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: The Lobster Man was Delicious!
Always have fresh shellfish.. I also love how you can order love pre boiled lobster. Best picnic idea
Delicious lobster rolls, one of the best place in Vancouver
Lobster at good price. Freshly steamed Lobster is a must for tourists visiting the Granville Island Public Market.
Friendly and helpful staff. Huge selection of oysters and fresh seafood. I highly recommend it.
Lobster Roll came out quickly. Bun was nicely toasted and had plenty of lobster.
Can always find ocean fresh oysters, mussels and of course lobster.  Staff could be a bit more service oriented but acceptable.
Awesome selection of self-serve oysters. Come in the morning for first pick!
tasty lobster rolls and fresh seafood, lobster man is the best!
The staff was very helpful in packing our fish that we caught today
Always a great place to get fresh raw oysters at a very reasonable price!
